question: What was the purpose of the secret organization "Ellinoglosso Xenodocheio"?
option1: To educate the Greeks and prepare the struggle against Ottoman rule over Greece.
option2: To educate the Greeks and prepare the struggle against German rule over Greece.
option3: To educate the Greeks and prepare the struggle against Russian rule over Greece.
option4: To educate the Greeks and prepare the struggle against French rule over Greece.
answer: To educate the Greeks and prepare the struggle against Ottoman rule over Greece.
explanation: The Ellinoglosso Xenodocheio was a secret organization established in Paris in 1814, whose purpose was to educate the Greeks and prepare the struggle against Ottoman rule over Greece. Two of its founders were the Macedonian Grigorios Zalykis and the Epirote Athanasios Tsakalov. The organization was a precursor of another organization, Filiki Eteria, of which Athanasios Tsakalov was a founding member and which succeeded in mobilizing Greeks against the Ottoman Empire culminating in the Greek War of Independence.
